QuestData.Title: Doin' De E'ko Magic
QuestData.Description: Mau'ari been makin' charms from da spirits of de wilds here for years now. Mau'ari just PLUCK de E'ko right outta de animals, and make charms for de kids, and de adventurers.$b$bOvah to de east, dere be a tall hill surrounded by de shardtooth bears. Up on de hill be Rimepelt, de oldest bear in de woods.$B$BMau'ari need dat bear for her magic. You bring me de bear's big ol' heart.
QuestData.CompletionText: You got de bear? Let's see de bear.
QuestData.RewardText: Dis is nice, big heart! If you be interested, Mau'ari tell ya how I be gettin' de E'ko....
